item.title: 轮播图
item.content:encoded:
轮播图

小圆点和图片统一​

// 跳转时，对应图片的小圆点变色
Dots();
function Dots() {
  var lis = document.querySelectorAll("li");
  lis.forEach((li, key) => {
    if (key === index) {
      li.style.background = "red";
    } else {
      li.style.background = "white";
    }
  });
}

轮播图功能​

autoPlay();
function autoPlay() {
  timer = setInterval(function () {
    // -520 * (index + 1) - 520  第一次图片由left：-520px 到 left：-1040px 移动
    move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1) - 520, function () {
      index++;
      if (index == 5) {
        index = 0;
        imgContainerEle.style.left = "-520px";
      }
      //   每次图片改变都需要判断
      Dots();
    });
  }, 2000);
}

鼠标移入停止轮播图 移出开启轮播图​

// 鼠标移入的时候 停止轮播的定时器
containerEle.onmouseenter = function () {
  console.log("执行了");
  clearInterval(timer);
};

// 鼠标移除的时候 轮播定时器继续开启；
containerEle.onmouseleave = function () {
  autoPlay();
};

点击下一张功能​

// 点击下一页按钮 轮播图切换到下一页；
var nextEle = document.querySelector(".next");
// debounce 防抖 一定时间内连续点击多次只会生效一次
nextEle.onclick = debounce(function () {
  move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1) - 520, function () {
    index++;
    console.log(index);
    if (index == 5) {
      index = 0;
      imgContainerEle.style.left = "-520px";
    }
    Dots();
  });
}, 1000);

点击上一张功能​

//   点击上一页功能
var preEle = document.querySelector(".pre");
// debounce 防抖 一定时间内连续点击多次只会生效一次
preEle.onclick = debounce(function () {
  move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * index, function () {
    index--;
    if (index == -1) {
      index = 4;
      imgContainerEle.style.left = "-2600px";
    }
    Dots();
    console.log(index);
  });
}, 1000);

点击小圆点跳转到对应图片​

//   点击li跳转到指定图片
var lis = document.querySelectorAll("li");
lis.forEach((li, i) => {
  li.onclick = function () {
    console.log(111);
    index = i;
    move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1), function () {
      Dots();
    });
  };
});

完整代码​

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
      .imgContainer {
        width: 2600px;
        position: absolute;
        left: -520px;
        top: 0px;
      }

      .imgContainer img {
        float: left;
      }

      .container {
        width: 520px;
        height: 280px;
        border: 1px solid;
        position: relative;
        margin: 0 auto;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .nextOrPre {
        width: 100%;
        position: absolute;
        top: 40%;
        font-size: 50px;
        z-index: 10;
        color: red;
      }

      .next {
        float: right;
      }
      ul {
        position: absolute;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        bottom: 20px;
        left: 30%;
        width: 130px;
      }
      ul > li {
        list-style: none;
        width: 20px;
        height: 20px;
        background: white;
        border-radius: 50%;
      }
    </style>
  </head>

  <body>
    <div class="container">
      <div class="nextOrPre">
        <span class="pre"> <</span>
        <span class="next">></span>
      </div>
      <div class="imgContainer">
        <img src="./imgs/1t.png" alt="" />
        <img src="./imgs/2t.png" alt="" />
        <img src="./imgs/3t.png" alt="" />
        <img src="./imgs/4t.png" alt="" />
        <img src="./imgs/5t.png" alt="" />
      </div>
      <ul>
        <li></li>
        <li></li>
        <li></li>
        <li></li>
        <li></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <script>
      var imgContainerEle = document.querySelector(".imgContainer");

      // 鼠标移入到轮播图的时候 停止轮播 ，鼠标离开的时候 启动轮播图
      var containerEle = document.querySelector(".container");

      var index = 0;
      var timer;

      autoPlay();
      function autoPlay() {
        timer = setInterval(function () {
          move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1) - 520, function () {
            console.log("运动结束");
            index++;
            console.log(index);
            if (index == 5) {
              index = 0;
              imgContainerEle.style.left = "-520px";
            }
            Dots();
            // window.requestAnimationFrame(autoPlay);
          });
        }, 2000);
      }

      // 鼠标移入的时候 停止轮播的定时器
      containerEle.onmouseenter = function () {
        console.log("执行了");
        clearInterval(timer);
      };

      // 鼠标移除的时候 轮播定时器继续开启；
      containerEle.onmouseleave = function () {
        autoPlay();
      };

      // 点击下一页按钮 轮播图切换到下一页；
      var nextEle = document.querySelector(".next");
      nextEle.onclick = debounce(function () {
        move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1) - 520, function () {
          index++;
          console.log(index);
          if (index == 5) {
            index = 0;
            imgContainerEle.style.left = "-520px";
          }
          Dots();
        });
      }, 1000);
      //   点击上一页功能
      var preEle = document.querySelector(".pre");
      preEle.onclick = debounce(function () {
        move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * index, function () {
          index--;
          if (index == -1) {
            index = 4;
            imgContainerEle.style.left = "-2600px";
          }
          Dots();
          console.log(index);
        });
      }, 1000);
      // containerEle.onmousemove = function(){
      //     console.log("执行了");
      //     clearInterval(timer)
      // }
      //   点击li跳转到指定图片
      var lis = document.querySelectorAll("li");
      lis.forEach((li, i) => {
        li.onclick = function () {
          console.log(111);
          index = i;
          move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * (index + 1), function () {
            Dots();
          });
        };
      });
      // 小点和图片统一
      Dots();
      function Dots() {
        var lis = document.querySelectorAll("li");
        lis.forEach((li, key) => {
          if (key === index) {
            li.style.background = "red";
          } else {
            li.style.background = "white";
          }
        });
      }
      //   离开页面时停止定时器  回到页面时开启定时器
      var flag = true;
      window.addEventListener("visibilitychange", function () {
        if (flag) {
          clearInterval(timer);
        } else {
          autoPlay();
        }
        flag = !flag;
      });
      copyImg();
      function copyImg() {
        var lastImg = imgContainerEle.lastElementChild;
        var firstImg = imgContainerEle.firstElementChild;
        // console.log(lastImg);
        // console.log(firstImg);
        var copyFirstImgEle = firstImg.cloneNode(true);
        var copyLastImgEle = lastImg.cloneNode(true);
        // console.log(copyFirstImgEle);
        imgContainerEle.style.width = "3640px";
        imgContainerEle.appendChild(copyFirstImgEle);
        imgContainerEle.insertBefore(copyLastImgEle, firstImg);
      }

      // 移动函数
      function move(boxEle, dir, target, cb) {
        var timer4 = setInterval(function () {
          var num = parseInt(getComputedStyle(boxEle)[dir]);
          var n = target > num ? 1 : -1;
          num += 5 * n;
          boxEle.style[dir] = num + "px";
          if (num == target) {
            clearInterval(timer4);
            console.log("结束");
            cb();
          }
        }, 10);
      }

      //防抖函数
      function debounce(fn, delay) {
        var timer;
        return function () {
          if (!timer) {
            fn();
          }
          clearTimeout(timer);
          timer = setTimeout(() => {
            timer = null;
          }, delay);
        };
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

item.title: DOM 方块拖拽
item.content:encoded:
单方块拖拽​

拖动后事件源的位置

x 轴的位置  B.clientX - A.clientX + A.offsetLeft
y 轴的位置  B.clientY - A.clientY + A.offsetTop

  • 鼠标按下的时候开始拖动 :onmousedown

  • 鼠标移动的时候元素开始动 ； onmousemove

  • 鼠标抬起的时候 停止拖动 onmouseup

<style>
  .box1 {
    width: 200px;
    height: 200px;
    background: red;
    position: absolute;
  }
</style>

<div class="box1"></div>
var div = document.querySelector(".box1");
div.onmousedown = function (e) {
  var x = e.clientX; // 绿色
  var y = e.clientY;
  var left = this.offsetLeft; // 紫色
  var top = this.offsetTop;
  div.onmousemove = function (e) {
    div.style.left = e.clientX - x + left + "px"; //把红线的位置 设置成box的坐标
    div.style.top = e.clientY - y + top + "px";
  };
};
div.onmouseup = function () {
  div.onmousemove = ""; //给onmousemove赋值为空 覆盖原有的值
};

多方块拖拽​

<style>
  .container {
    width: 590px;
    height: 590px;
    border: 5px solid;
    position: relative;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  .container div {
    width: 180px;
    height: 180px;
    position: absolute;
    background: gray;
    color: white;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 180px;
  }
</style>

<div class="container">
  <div style="left: 10px; top: 10px">1</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top: 10px">2</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top: 10px">3</div>
  <div style="left: 10px; top: 33.33%">4</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top: 33.33%">5</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top: 33.33%">6</div>
  <div style="left: 10px; top: 66.66%">7</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top: 66.66%">8</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top: 66.66%">9</div>
</div>
var colorArr = [
  "black",
  "red",
  "blue",
  "orange",
  "pink",
  "yellow",
  "skyblue",
  "green",
  "yellowgreen",
];
// 根据数据渲染颜色
var divs = document.querySelectorAll(".container div");
for (var i = 0; i < divs.length; i++) {
  divs[i].style.backgroundColor = colorArr[i];
}
// 循环绑定
divs.forEach((item) => {
  item.onmousedown = function (e) {
    var x = e.clientX - this.offsetLeft;
    var y = e.clientY - this.offsetTop;
    this.style.zIndex = 1;
    this.onmousemove = function (e) {
      this.style.left = e.clientX - x + "px";
      this.style.top = e.clientY - y + "px";
    };
  };
  item.onmouseup = function () {
    this.onmousemove = "";
    this.style.zIndex = 0;
  };
});

检测两个方块是否碰撞​

碰撞条件：
    A的最大边Amax 大于 B的最小边Bmin
    A的最小边Amin 小于 B的最大边Bmax
    两个条件同时满足

<style>
  .box1 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    background-color: red;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0px;
  }

  .box2 {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    background-color: blue;
    position: absolute;
    left: 300px;
  }
</style>

<div class="box1"></div>
<div class="box2"></div>
var box1Ele = document.querySelector(".box1");
var box2Ele = document.querySelector(".box2");

box1Ele.onmousedown = function (e) {
  var x = e.clientX - this.offsetLeft;
  var y = e.clientY - this.offsetTop;
  this.onmousemove = function (e) {
    // 在方块移动的时候需要检测是否碰了 ；
    if (isCrash(box1Ele, box2Ele)) {
      console.log("碰撞了");
    } else {
      console.log("没有碰撞");
    }
    this.style.left = e.clientX - x + "px";
    this.style.top = e.clientY - y + "px";
  };
};
box1Ele.onmouseup = function () {
  this.onmousemove = "";
};
//  把碰撞封装成函数  提高复用性
function isCrash(box1Ele, box2Ele) {
  var Almin = box1Ele.offsetLeft;
  var Almax = box1Ele.offsetLeft + box1Ele.offsetWidth;
  var Blmin = box2Ele.offsetLeft;
  var Blmax = box2Ele.offsetLeft + box2Ele.offsetWidth;
  var Atmin = box1Ele.offsetTop;
  var Atmax = box1Ele.offsetTop + box1Ele.offsetHeight;
  var Btmin = box2Ele.offsetTop;
  var Btmax = box2Ele.offsetTop + box2Ele.offsetHeight;
  if (Almax > Blmin && Almin < Blmax && Atmax > Btmin && Atmin < Btmax) {
    return true;
  } else {
    return false;
  }
}

多方块碰撞 碰撞面积最大交换位置​

计算碰撞面积​

检查拖拽元素和其他 8 个元素是否碰撞

// 1.检测拖拽元素 和其他8个元素是否碰撞了
var that = this;
divs.forEach(function (div) {
  if (div !== that) {
    // 把自己排除；
    // 其他的8个元素；
    // 检测this 和其他的8个元素是否碰了；
    if (isCrash(that, div)) {
      // console.log("有div和this碰了",div);
      crashArr.push(div);
    }
  }
});

获取碰撞最大面积的元素

var maxArea = 0;
var maxEle = null;
crashArr.forEach((item) => {
  var w = this.offsetWidth - Math.abs(item.offsetLeft - this.offsetLeft);
  var h = this.offsetHeight - Math.abs(item.offsetTop - this.offsetTop);
  var area = w * h;
  if (area > maxArea) {
    maxArea = area;
    maxEle = item;
    console.log(maxArea);
  }
});

和碰撞面积最大的交换位置​

var position = {};
position.left = this.style.left;
position.top = this.style.top;
/* 鼠标抬起时判断 */
item.onmouseup = function () {
  this.style.transition = "1s";
  maxEle.style.transition = "1s";
  if (maxEle) {
    // 和碰撞元素交换位置
    this.style.top = maxEle.style.top;
    this.style.left = maxEle.style.left;
    maxEle.style.top = position.top;
    maxEle.style.left = position.left;
  } else {
    // 拖拽元素没有碰撞元素；
    this.style.left = initPos.left;
    this.style.top = initPos.top;
  }
  this.onmousemove = "";

  this.style.zIndex = 0;
};

边界限定​

// 左边和右边
if (divX <= 0) {
  divX = 0;
}
if (divX >= container.clientWidth - this.offsetWidth) {
  divX = container.clientWidth - this.offsetWidth;
}
// 上边和下边
if (divY <= 0) {
  divY = 0;
}
if (divY >= container.clientHeight - this.offsetHeight) {
  divY = container.clientHeight - this.offsetHeight;
}

完整代码​

<style>
  .container {
    width: 590px;
    height: 590px;
    border: 5px solid;
    position: relative;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .container div {
    width: 180px;
    height: 180px;
    position: absolute;
    background: gray;
    color: white;
    font-size: 30px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 180px;
  }
</style>

<div class="container">
  <div style="left: 10px; top:10px;">1</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top:10px;">2</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top:10px;">3</div>
  <div style="left: 10px; top:33.33%;">4</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top:33.33%;">5</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top:33.33%;">6</div>
  <div style="left: 10px; top:66.66%;">7</div>
  <div style="left: 34%; top:66.66%;">8</div>
  <div style="left: 66.66%; top:66.66%;">9</div>
</div>
var colorArr = [
  "black",
  "red",
  "blue",
  "orange",
  "pink",
  "yellow",
  "skyblue",
  "green",
  "yellowgreen",
];
var divs = document.querySelectorAll(".container div");
for (var i = 0; i < divs.length; i++) {
  divs[i].style.backgroundColor = colorArr[i];
}
var containerEle = document.querySelector(".container");
// console.log( divs);
divs.forEach(function (item) {
  // item 是 每一个 方块div
  item.onmousedown = function (e) {
    // 开始拖动的时候 把 拖拽元素的过渡效果取消；
    this.style.transition = "none";
    // 当鼠标按下的时候 把这个元素的层级提高
    this.style.zIndex = 10;
    var x = e.clientX - this.offsetLeft;
    var y = e.clientY - this.offsetTop;
    var initPos = {}; // 记录拖拽元素的初始位置；
    initPos.left = this.style.left;
    initPos.top = this.style.top;
    console.log(initPos);
    var maxEle = null; // 碰撞面积最大的元素
    this.onmousemove = function (e) {
      var crashArr = []; // 存放和拖拽元素碰撞了的元素；
      // 检测拖动元素 和 其他8个元素是否碰撞了，
      // 如果碰了 ，就把碰撞的元素保存起来
      //  判断 碰撞元素的面积 ，让拖拽元素和碰撞面积最大的元素互换位置
      // 1.检测拖拽元素 和其他8个元素是否碰撞了
      var that = this;
      divs.forEach(function (div) {
        // console.log("?",div);
        if (div !== that) {
          // 把自己排除；
          // console.log(123);
          // 其他的8个元素；
          // 检测this 和其他的8个元素是否碰了；
          if (isCrash(that, div)) {
            // console.log("有div和this碰了",div);
            crashArr.push(div);
          }
        }
      });
      console.log("碰撞的元素数组", crashArr);
      // 计算和碰撞元素的面积
      var maxArae = 0; // 假定最大碰撞面积是0；
      crashArr.forEach(function (item) {
        var w = that.offsetWidth - Math.abs(item.offsetLeft - that.offsetLeft);
        var h = that.offsetHeight - Math.abs(item.offsetTop - that.offsetTop);
        var arae = w * h;
        if (arae > maxArae) {
          maxArae = arae;
          // 获取最大面积
          // console.log("最大面积碰撞的")
          maxEle = item;
        }
      });
      console.log("碰撞最大面积的元素是:", maxEle);
      var disX = e.clientX - x;
      var disY = e.clientY - y;
      // 左边的边距
      if (disX <= 0) {
        disX = 0;
      }
      // 右边的边距
      if (disX >= containerEle.clientWidth - this.offsetWidth) {
        disX = containerEle.clientWidth - this.offsetWidth;
      }
      // 上边的位置
      if (disY <= 0) {
        disY = 0;
      }
      // 下边的位置
      if (disY >= containerEle.clientHeight - this.offsetHeight) {
        disY = containerEle.clientHeight - this.offsetHeight;
      }
      this.style.left = disX + "px";
      this.style.top = disY + "px";
    };
    this.onmouseup = function () {
      // 互换位置 ： 拖拽元素  和 碰撞面积最大的元素   位置；
      // 给拖拽的元素加上过渡；
      this.style.transition = "all 1s";
      if (maxEle) {
        // 有碰撞最大面积元素
        this.style.left = maxEle.style.left;
        this.style.top = maxEle.style.top;

        maxEle.style.left = initPos.left;
        maxEle.style.top = initPos.top;
      } else {
        // 拖拽元素没有碰撞元素；
        this.style.left = initPos.left;
        this.style.top = initPos.top;
      }
      this.style.zIndex = 0;
      this.onmousemove = "";
    };
  };
});

item.title: MDX Blog Post
item.description: Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.
item.content:encoded:
Blog posts support Docusaurus Markdown features, such as MDX.

提示

Use the power of React to create interactive blog posts.

<button onClick={() => alert("button clicked!")}>Click me!</button>

item.title: Long Blog Post
item.description: This is the summary of a very long blog post,
item.content:encoded:
This is the summary of a very long blog post,

Use a <!-- truncate --> comment to limit blog post size in the list view.

item.title: 今天真搞笑
item.description: // debounce 防抖 一定时间内连续点击多次只会生效一次
item.content:encoded: // debounce 防抖 一定时间内连续点击多次只会生效一次 preEle.onclick = debounce(function () { move(imgContainerEle, "left", -520 * index, function () { index--; if (index == -1) { index = 4; imgContainerEle.style.left = "-2600px"; } Dots(); console.log(index); }); }, 1000);
